content: When browsing a profile in simplifer there used to be a public endpoint option (for a URL to retrieve the profile etc), however now there is only a private endpoint. Has this feature been removed now?
Hi Chris, we just migrated Simplifier to a new platform - and we've implemented new FHIR server technology. We public endpoint is temporary gone, but we are currently rebuilding it.

Thanks @Martijn Harthoorn

Do you have any idea approximately when it will be back? In the next two weeks for example?
Yes. When all goes well, we have it back within two weeks.
